name: They Grow
description:
(Click to launch full screen for best experience) 

Welcome to They Grow

This is a Blackthornprod game jam entry on the theme 'Less is more'. 

Click and hold the spaceship and move mouse left and right to rotate around the planet, right click to fire the beam at little guys to shrink them.

Don't let the little guys get too big. If one of them gets too close to the spaceship, you're done for.

All assets made by dutchlish (Mike Bailey) apart from sounds from freesound.org (creative commons licence).
